title: Socks and Mittens go Exploring
description: Join Socks and Mittens in their first adventure!Socks and Mittens are two mischievous kittens who love exploring. One day, they decide to explore past their garden and see what adventures they can find. They get themselves into some exciting, and sometimes dangerous situations; but they also meet some new friends along the way.This is the first story in the Socks and Mittens series.
author: Charlotte          Reynolds
